CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, February 28, 1948, pg. 9, reads: "GIRL FRIENDS ENTERTAIN - The Pittsburgh Chapter of Girl Friends, Inc., entertained their husbands last Sunday at the home of member Mrs. James Henry - and for out-of-town guests had two of the delightful singing and playing stars, the Jones Brothers. Sown are, seated: Mrs. McKinley King, Mrs. John Butler, Ms. Garfield Nickens, Max Jones, Mrs. William Houston, Mrs. Roland Sawyer, Mrs. Oscar Harris.  Standing: Mrs. Everett Utterback, Mrs. Chester E. Harris, Mrs. Wendell Stanton, Herbert Jones, Mrs. Henry, Mrs. E. H. Robinson, Mrs. Herbert Jones, and other charming guest; Mrs. Homer S. Brown, Mrs. T. D. Hamilton and Mrs. Lawrence Downing. Missing are member Mrs. Paul Jones and Mrs. John W. Johnson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including members of Girl Friends, Inc. club, seated: Ruth King, Marjorie Butler, Winnie T. Nickens, Max Jones, Wini Ormes Houston, Aileen Eckstein Sawyer, Marjorie Harris; standing: Bernice Utterback, Ethel Ramos Harris, Gladys Stanton, Herbert Jones, Jerri Henry, Marie Robinson, Toni Jones, Wilhelmina Byrd Brown, Marie Hamilton, and Hazel Downing, posed in living room of Henry home
